resources.string:
1. Beijing is the capital of the People's republic of China.

 2. Bei means northern and jin means capital.

 3. Thus, Beijing litterally means the north capital.

 4. It is home to the world's longest wall.

 5. Beijing's Forbidden City is the largest palace in the world.

 6. Bejing was the capital for more than 6 dynsaties and governments.

 7. Has 13 suburban districts: Changping, Daxing, Dongcheng, Fangshan, Fengtai , Huairou, Mentougou, Miyun, Pinggu, hijingshan, Shunyi, Tongzhou, Yanqing. 

 8. Two main airports: Capital International and Nanyuan Airport. 

 9. The Forbidden City has a Palace Museum with imperial collections of Chinese art. 

10. Beijing City was established over 3,000 years ago 

11. Hosts one of the earliest living humans called Peking Man. 

12. October 1st 1949, the People's Republic of China was founded. 

13. Forbidden City was built from 1406 to 1420. 

14. Forbidden City consists of 980 buildings taking 7,800,000 square feet. 

15. Forbidden City was home to 24 emperors.
